item.title: Basic Structured Operation in Pyspark.
item.description: This is summary of chapter 5 of the Spark-The-Definitive-Guide book. This is a must read book if you really want to know much about spark. I found myself going back to back so I decided to create a simple summary of each chapter of the key point. I hope you find it useful too. Imports from pyspark.sql import SparkSession from pyspark.sql import Row from pyspark.sql.types import StringType, StructField, StructType, LongType from pyspark.

item.title: Use Python Enums to make your code readable.
item.description: Enums in Python and its uses cases In this tutorial, I will show how to construct enum type in python and examples of its uses. I will focus more on the parts you are most likely to use in your everyday python programming and touch on the other parts just for completness sake. Enum is a short form for enumeration. It is used to give names to a set of constants.
